concept.title: AWS Credentials
concept.shortdesc: When reads data from an Amazon S3 or Kinesis Consumer origin, it must pass credentials to Amazon Web Services.

conbody.p:
Kinesis Consumer origincredentialsAWS credentialsKinesis ConsumerAmazon S3 origincredentialsAWS credentialsAmazon S3Use one of the following methods to pass AWS credentials:
IAM roles When runs on an Amazon EC2 instance, you can use the AWS Management Console to configure an IAM role for the EC2 instance. uses the IAM instance profile credentials to automatically connect to AWS. When you use IAM roles, you do not need to specify the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key properties in the origin. For more information about assigning an IAM role to an EC2 instance, see the Amazon EC2 documentation.
AWS access key pairs When does not run on an Amazon EC2 instance or when the EC2 instance doesnâ€™t have an IAM role, you must specify the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key properties in the origin.
